data.title: 功能介绍
data.content: 简单介绍一下脚本所拥有的功能: </br>
data.reader: function reader (me) { Ext.create('Ext.window.Window', { title: me.title, width: '60%', height:'60%', modal: true, resizable: true, layout: 'fit', items: [{xtype: 'form', autoScroll: true, frame: true, padding: '1', html: me.content }] }).show(); }
